title: Started CS Journey
subtitle: Computer Science Undergraduate
description: Began my Computer Science degree, diving into programming fundamentals and discovering my passion for web development. Started with HTML, CSS, and basic programming concepts.

title: Frontend Development Mastery
subtitle: HTML, CSS & JavaScript
description: Mastered modern frontend technologies including responsive design, JavaScript ES6+, and DOM manipulation. Built several interactive web applications and landing pages.

title: React.js Exploration
subtitle: Component-Based Architecture
description: Transitioned to React.js, learning component-based architecture, hooks, state management, and modern development practices. Created dynamic user interfaces and SPAs.

title: MERN Stack Development
subtitle: Full-Stack Web Development
description: Mastering full-stack development with the MERN stack. Building complete web applications with MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js as an integrated technology stack.

title: Data Structures & Algorithms
subtitle: Java Programming Focus
description: Currently deepening my understanding of DSA using Java. Learning algorithmic problem-solving, time complexity analysis, and implementing various data structures from scratch.

title: AI Tools Integration
subtitle: Modern Development Workflow
description: Experimenting with AI-powered development tools like GitHub Copilot and ChatGPT to enhance productivity and code quality. Exploring the future of AI-assisted programming.
